Item.OrderTitle: medical innovation (No. 2): Ten Minute Rule Motion

Text.p: That leave be given to bring in a Bill to make provision about innovation in medical treatment.

Item.OrderTitle: transparency of lobbying, non-party campaigning and trade union administration Bill: committee (DAY 3)

Text.p: That the draft Legal Aid (Information about Financial Resources) (Amendment) Regulations 2013, which were laid before this House on 20 May, be approved.
That the draft Armed Forces (Alcohol Limits for Prescribed Safety-Critical Duties) Regulations 2013, which were laid before this House on 1 July, be approved.
That the draft Armed Forces Act (Continuation) Order 2013, which was laid before this House on 2 July, be approved.
That the draft Health and Social Care Act 2012 (Consequential Amendments) (No. 2) Order 2013, which was laid before this House on 5 July, be approved.
That the draft Court of Appeal (Recording and Broadcasting) Order 2013, which was laid before this House on 8 July, be approved.
Beecroft Road car park redevelopment (Aidan Burley)

Item.DebateTitle: Future of Public Health England at Porton Down
